scenes.action_text: BEASTS OF NO NATION Written by Cary Joji Fukunaga Based on the novel by Uzodinma Iweala May 8th, 2014 SHOOTING SCRIPT FORWARD NOTE: The dialogue in this screenplay is faithful in form to the novel, originally written in a lighter form of Nigerian Pidgin English known as Krio. Krio (and its various dialects) is used as a lingua franca throughout West Africa,
